Macro DO-DATABASE

Syntax:

do-database (key datum db &optional return) decl* form* => result*

Arguments and Values:

key---a variable

datum---a variable

db---a db

return---a form

decl---a declare expression, not evaluated

form---an implicit progn

result---one or more objects

Description:

Iterates over the database contents evaluating form* with key and datum bound to each key/datum pair in turn. When the last pair has been seen, return is evaluated and its value(s) are returned.
